channel.title: I want to install VirtualBox 5.1.24 .
channel.description:
Hi , I want to install VirtualBox 5.1.24 . Please Help me ... I tried to do Nested Virtualization , like him . https://forums.whonix.org/t/nested-visualization-with-whonix-vbox-windows-7-inside-whonix-ws/2001
At first , I tried to do this in konsole panel .
sudo apt-get install virtualbox linux-headers-$(uname -r)
Maybe , installed VirtualBox 4.6 . I tried to install Windows 7 in it . But , I could not install it ...
I have heard that VirtualBox under 5.0 version cant do Nested Virtualization .
So , I tried to install The Newest version 5.1.24 . I have removed the old version . and I downloaded virtualbox for debian 8 jessie i386 . https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Linux_Downloads
I put it into VirtualBox folder of Desktop . And I have done this
sudo dpkg -i /home/user/Desktop/VirtualBox/virtualbox-5.1_5.1.24-117012~Debian~jessie_i386.deb
But , some error appeared ... I tried to run VirtualBox , but operation window didnt appeared . So , I couldnt run Virtualbox ...
So ,I have deleted Whonix , and installed it , again . Please tell me the way to install VirtualBox 5.1.24 . I want to try to succeed Nested virtualization . Windows7 => Whonix Workstation => Windows 7

item.title: I want to install VirtualBox 5.1.24 .
item.dc:creator: freeman
item.description:
Hi ,
I want to install VirtualBox 5.1.24 .
Please Help me …
I tried to do Nested Virtualization , like him .

nested visualization with whonix (Vbox + windows 7 inside whonix WS) VirtualBox
i have tried to install vbox inside whonix workstation + installing windows 7 for test = worked great , directly&smoothly with no errors. steps r very basic & simple except with little bit differences:- Note: inside whonix by default the dkms is installed. so no need to install it. 1- download virtualbox for debian 8 jessie i386 (important to choose i386) from this link:- https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Linux_Downloads 2- optional:- download SHA256 checksum 3- put the SHA256 file…

At first , I tried to do this in konsole panel .

sudo apt-get install virtualbox linux-headers-$(uname -r)

Maybe , installed VirtualBox 4.6 .
I tried to install Windows 7 in it .
But , I could not install it …

I have heard that VirtualBox under 5.0 version cant do Nested Virtualization .

So , I tried to install The Newest version 5.1.24 .
I have removed the old version . and
I downloaded virtualbox for debian 8 jessie i386 .
https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Linux_Downloads

I put it into VirtualBox folder of Desktop .
And I have done this

sudo dpkg -i /home/user/Desktop/VirtualBox/virtualbox-5.1_5.1.24-117012~Debian~jessie_i386.deb

But , some error appeared …
I tried to run VirtualBox , but operation window didnt appeared .
So , I couldnt run Virtualbox …

So ,I have deleted Whonix , and installed it , again .
Please tell me the way to install VirtualBox 5.1.24 .
I want to try to succeed Nested virtualization .
Windows7 => Whonix Workstation => Windows 7

Read full topic
